name: My Pocket Hayami
description:
This is a remake/port of My Hayami-Chan, if you don't own an Android phone you can try that game instead.

This version of the game doesn't contain as much content as the PC version, such as Cutscenes/Story & a few Mini-Games.
Some mechanics are also altered to fit the "phone-game genre" a bit better.

The only thing this game has that the PC version doesn't have is 2 extra outfits/characters you can obtain. Aliceanna from HNR and Kuno Leo, that's me!

This game has no microtransactions and is 100% free to play.

If you don't want your progress in the game to be deleted when a new updates come out DO NOT uninstall the game, download the new .apk and your phone will ask you if you want to update the game.
